title: 2 people calling same role in normal blind pic first, fight ensues!!
body:
I am sure its happened to everyone here where you call a position in blind pic first and on your screen it shows that you did but others in your team are adamant some one else did, next comes the copy paste battle, then boom time runs out you have 2 tops or ADC and your whole team starts the game in a rage and threatening to report everyone else. sound familiar well apparently its a common problem, i have confirmed it with mates and LOL player support have admitted to me that it happens. so i have to ask why has it not been fixed as far as i can tell its one of the biggest problems with LOL and in dire need of a patch of some sort. i mean im no tech genius but i assume it has something to do with internet speeds and lag but there must be a 
way of preventing it??

replies.body: whoever copy+pastes their chat log first loses
Blind pick is a stupid method itself. Everyone goes to team builder pls.
It's funny. If people really didn't want the fights they would play team builder where you can pick your roll and your champ without all the issues :D

> -snip-

The only reason it shows up on your screen first but others not is because of the client. Your client may say that you called first but it has to register through others so I think it might have to be your Internet speed that processes everything. It's like a Skype message. If you're next to your friend and you're on Skype and he's on Skype and he sends you a message, it's instant for him but it takes a second or so for you to be able to see it.
Just let them take it. It's not really that big of an issue. You can try to get x role next game.
